channel.title: Tal Ater on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Templated issue reporting in Github
item.description: A well-managed software project will inevitably have issues come up that need discussion and resolution. These might be out-and-out bugs, but more often than not they are also difficulties that people have getting started running something complex, or issues that arise when building for an environment that is not the same as what the developers have experienced. The best projects I’ve seen have used the ability for Github to provide a template for the issue report.
